summary.span: 提供 介面的範例實作。

span.span: Provides an example implementation of the interface.

summary.span: 這個類別是抽象的。

span.span: This class is abstract.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是很有用的基底類別衍生自程式碼產生器。This is a useful base class for code generators to derive from. 程式碼產生器是可轉譯的 Code Document Object Model (CodeDOM) 圖形結構根據特定語言的原始程式碼。Code generators are capable of rendering source code in a specific language according to the structure of a Code Document Object Model (CodeDOM) graph. 這個類別會提供許多函式和方法，以從 CodeDOM 圖表產生特定類型的程式碼。This class provides many functions and methods to generate specific types of code from a CodeDOM graph. > [!NOTE] > 這個類別包含的連結要求和繼承要求套用到所有成員的類別層級。This class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. A立即呼叫者或衍生的類別並沒有完全信任權限時，會擲回。A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have full-trust permission. 如需安全性需求的詳細資訊，請參閱[連結要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)和[繼承要求](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9)。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).

permission.span: 針對完全信任立即呼叫者。

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個類別無法供部分信任程式碼。

span.span: This class cannot be used by partially trusted code.
for full trust for inheritors.

permission.span: 這個類別無法被繼承，部分信任程式碼。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.

summary.span: 產生行接續字元 (Line-Continuation Character)，並將指定字串輸出到新行上。

span.span: Generates a line-continuation character and outputs the specified string on a new line.

para.span: 當實作的程式碼產生器支援的語言是行接續字元 (例如，Visual Basic)，這個方法應該輸出行接續字元之前它會輸出新行字元。

span.span: When implementing a code generator for a language that supports a line-continuation character (for example, Visual Basic), this method should output the line-continuation character before it outputs a newline character.

summary.span: 為指定值建立逸出識別項。

span.span: Creates an escaped identifier for the specified value.
The escaped identifier for the value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 測試是否與保留的識別項相衝突或語言關鍵字，如果是的話，會傳回具有特定語言的逸出程式碼格式設定的對等名稱。 tests whether the identifier conflicts with reserved or language keywords, and if so, returns an equivalent name with language-specific escape code formatting. 傳回的名稱被指逸出識別項。The returned name is referred to an escaped identifier. 逸出識別項包含相同`value`但包含逸出程式碼格式設定以便區別衝突的關鍵字。The escaped identifier contains the same `value` but includes escape code formatting to differentiate it from conflicting keywords. 比方說，`value`無法前面加上 at 符號 ("@") 或方括號以分隔 ("["和"]") 建立的逸出識別項。For example, `value` could be preceded by an at sign ("@") or delimited by square brackets ("[" and "]") to create an escaped identifier. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法的預設實作沒有任何作用。The default implementation of this method does nothing.

span.span: A string to create a valid identifier for.

span.span: Creates a valid identifier for the specified value.
A valid identifier for the value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 測試是否與保留衝突的識別項或多個語言關鍵字，若是如此，傳回有效的識別項名稱不衝突。 tests whether the identifier conflicts with reserved or language keywords, and if so, returns a valid identifier name that does not conflict. 傳回的識別項包含相同`value`但包含逸出程式碼格式設定以便區別衝突的關鍵字。The returned identifier contains the same `value` but includes escape code formatting to differentiate it from conflicting keywords. 一般而言，如果值需要修改，它會加上底線"_"。Typically, if the value requires modification, it is preceded by an underscore "_". > [!NOTE] > 這個方法的預設實作沒有任何作用。The default implementation of this method does nothing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 成員的程式碼會產生以不同的方式，視內容而定。Code for members is generated differently depending on the context. 例如，程式碼的介面或列舉型別上的欄位是以不同的方式從程式碼產生相同成員的類別上的。For example, code for methods on an interface or fields on an enumeration is generated differently from code for the same member on a class. 此實作會假設成員所產生的類別內容。This implementation assumes that the member is being generated for the class context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會檢查指定的字串，以確保它不包含可用來逸出識別項欄位的特定字元。This method checks the specified string to ensure that it does not contain certain characters that can be used to escape an identifier field. 方法會呼叫這個方法，以執行驗證的字串。The method calls this method to perform string validation. 呼叫方法並傳遞從中產生程式碼可以阻止使用某些字元的序列包含識別欄位中的隱藏程式碼之前。Calling the method and passing a before generating code from it can prevent the use of certain character sequences to include hidden code within an identifier field.

param.name: e
param.span: 要測試識別項是否無效的物件。

span.span: An object to test for invalid identifiers.

summary.span: 嘗試驗證指定 或 樹狀結構中所包含的每個識別項欄位。

span.span: Attempts to validate each identifier field contained in the specified or tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能的識別項欄位包含欄位逸出字元和隱藏程式碼可以讓安全性違規的物件。It is possible for the identifier fields of objects to contain field escape characters and hidden code which can allow security violations. 這個方法會檢查每個常值的欄位中樹狀目錄中的字元可用來隱藏程式碼，並擲回例外狀況，如果識別項欄位包含無效的字元。This method checks the literal fields of each in a tree for characters which could be used to hide code, and throws an exception if an identifier field contains an invalid character. 這個方法會呼叫方法以驗證指定的每個識別項或樹狀，並擲回例外狀況，如果識別項無效，或包含無效的字元。This method calls the method to validate each identifier in the specified or tree, and throws an exception if an identifier is invalid or contains invalid characters. 呼叫這個方法，並將它傳遞包含產生封鎖的特定字元序列，可以用來包含識別欄位中的隱藏程式碼使用的程式碼之前產生的程式碼圖形。Call this method and pass it the containing the code graph to generate before generating code to block the use of certain character sequences that can be used to include hidden code within an identifier field. 任何產生的程式碼方法，是不會自動呼叫這個方法。This method is not called automatically by any generate code methods.

exception.span: 指定的 包含無效的識別項。

span.span: The specified contains an invalid identifier.

permission.span: 針對完全信任立即呼叫者。

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
